t: Amazon.com: The Band[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: I listened to the original LP for many years, replaced by an expensive imported pressing, then the mediocre Capitol CD for many more. This format is by far superior to any other I've heard. Vinyl simply cannot compare, and the CD, while okay, is not even close.

t: Amazon.com: Brand New Maid: CDs & Vinyl
s: Brand New Maid may be one of the most underrated albums that BAND-MAID has, personally. While only having 8 songs, the entire album is still a great listen from start to finish.
